title: The Plan 2013 v1.0-P2P
description:
The Plan 2013 v1.0-P2P


Information:


Year: 2013
Genre: Adventure
Developer: Studio Krillbite
Publisher: Studio Krillbite
Platform: PC
Language: English
Sound language: None
Publication Type: License
Medicine: Not required


Description:


The Plan is a free atmospheric videogame, exploring issues of death and meaning. 
Being a rather short and experimental project, it's suitable for those who usually don't play as much and / or have little spare time, even though we think The Plan will appeal to a wide range of people as well.


System Requirements:


Operating system: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8
Processor: Intel Dual Core processor with a clock frequency of 1.5 GHz
Memory: 1 GB
Hard drive space: 1 GB
Sound device: compatible with DirectX
Video: 256 MB VRAM


Installation Steps:


1) Download the torrent.

2) Install the game Via Setup.

3) Block firewall and Disable Antivirus.

4) Play and have fun.

5) Support the Developers if you like the game.
